scenarios.name: Cold Call - SaaS Demo Booking
scenarios.description: Practice cold calling a prospect to book a demo for your SaaS product

nodes.label: Initial Greeting
botResponses: Hi there! This is Alex calling from CloudSync. Do you have a quick minute?
Hello! I'm reaching out because I think there might be a fit between what we do and your team. Do you have a moment?
Hi! Quick question - are you the right person to talk to about your team's project management tools?
nodes.clarificationPrompt: Just checking - do you have time to chat?

nodes.label: Value Proposition
botResponses: Great! We help teams like yours reduce project overhead by about 30%. I'd love to show you how.
Perfect. So we work with companies to streamline their workflows - most of our clients save about 5 hours per week per team member.
Awesome. Essentially, we've built a platform that integrates with your existing tools to cut down on manual work.

nodes.label: Build Rapport
botResponses: I was looking at your LinkedIn - impressive growth this year. How's the team scaling with it?
I noticed you folks have been pretty active in the space. What's been the biggest challenge as you've grown?
Your company's doing some cool stuff. What's it like building in such a fast-moving market?

nodes.label: Pain Discovery
botResponses: What's your biggest pain point when it comes to project coordination right now?
I'm curious - what's taking up the most time on your plate these days?
When it comes to team collaboration, where do you lose the most time?

nodes.label: Timeline Discovery
botResponses: Got it. And when are you thinking you'd want to explore solutions for that?
That makes sense. What's your timeline for looking at tools to help?
Understood. So if I were to show you something that could address that in the next few weeks, would that be relevant?

nodes.label: Handle Timing Objection
botResponses: I understand - it's not urgent right now. But if things change, would it make sense to stay connected?
That's fair. Our clients tell us that once they see how much time it saves, they regret not acting sooner. Can I send you a quick demo?
No worries. Sometimes it takes seeing the impact to realize the priority. Would you be open to a 15-minute call next week?

nodes.label: Handle Budget Objection
botResponses: I get it - budget is always a concern. But consider this: if you're saving 5 hours per person per week, that's thousands in productivity gains. How does that sound?
Budget is definitely important. What if I could show you ROI in the first month?
That's a valid concern. Most of our clients see payback within 60 days. Would it help to see the numbers?

nodes.label: Closing - Next Steps
botResponses: Excellent! Let me send you a demo link. What's the best email, and when works best for you?
Perfect! I'll set up a quick 20-minute demo with our team. How does your calendar look next Tuesday or Wednesday?
Great! Let me get your info and we'll get something on the calendar. What's your preferred time zone?

nodes.label: Demo Booked - Success
botResponses: Awesome! You'll get a calendar invite shortly. Looking forward to showing you what we can do. Thanks so much!

nodes.label: Prospect Declined
botResponses: No problem! If things change, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!

nodes.label: Call Hung Up
botResponses: Thanks for your time!

nodes.label: Maybe Later
botResponses: Sure, let me know once you've checked. I'll reach back out next week!
